sub_topic: Examining the detectability of gravitational waves from a primordial black hole population.
message_1: What would be the expected signal-to-noise ratio for detecting gravitational waves emitted from a primordial black hole population with a mass range of 10-100 solar masses using a ground-based interferometer like LIGO at a distance of 100 Mpc from Earth?
